misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a force to be reckoned with on the greens, hails from the esteemed Helsingin Golfklubi. While his prowess on the course is undeniable, few are aware of his successful side career as a professional model. Olli's striking looks and imposing physique have graced numerous magazine covers and advertising campaigns.

Beyond his aesthetic appeal, Olli is known for his intimidating presence and rumored wrestling skills. Few players dare to challenge him, making him a formidable opponent both physically and mentally.

Having participated in 7 past Hector Trophée tournaments, Olli is eagerly preparing for his eighth appearance in 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy titles have eluded him thus far, Olli's determination and skill make him a perennial threat.
The Helsingin Golfklubi will be watching Olli closely as he competes in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
